settings.heading: Your Dream Bedroom is within reach!
settings.small_text: See detailed terms and conditions below.

settings.heading: Enter to win $3,000 for a bedroom makeover.
settings.paragraph: Is your bedroom in need of an upgrade? Well, now that you've levelled up your sleep with Smart Nora, we are giving you a chance to transform your bedroom to match the better sleep you're getting. We'll be sponsoring lucky winners $3,000 to upgrade their bedroom. Could you be the one? Enter today.

settings.heading: Rules and Terms
settings.description: A winner will be randomly drawn every month in the first week and notified via email. Please note only active Smart Nora customers are eligible to enter and win. If the product is returned or the entree has not made a purchase, the entry will be voided.
